metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15709 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - untriaged.
metadata.Description:
When using the OpenWire protocol in ActiveMQ versions 5.14.0 to 5.15.2 it was found that certain system details (such as the OS and kernel version) are exposed as plain text.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15709` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

activemq - 5.15.3-2
libactivemq-java - 5.15.3-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: activemq package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.15.3-2').
